long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Floating Video Player You can watch Youtube Videos in a window that always stays on top.
Youtube Pip & Floating Video Player YP. Open active video in Picture-in-Picture
Easy Installation and Installation

Installing and setting up the Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome is quick and easy.
Go to the Chrome Web Store, search for the extension, and click “Add to Chrome.”
Once installed, the extension will be available in the toolbar for easy access.

Picture in Picture; It is compatible with major video platforms such as YouTube, Vimeo and Dailymotion. You can use this extension to watch any video, whether it is a movie, a TV show, or an education.


Picture in Picture is designed to protect your privacy. The extension does not collect any personal data or browsing history, so you can use it with confidence.
